posts.post_content:
i am seeking to find the exact T206 BL 460 i used to own a few years back. i bought it on Net54, and sold it thru Barry Sloate's (hi Barry) last auction (if i remember correctly). it's Stahl, arms up (pic attached). it was hand-cut and PSA slabbed it AUTH.

if the current owner has any interest in selling, i will pay handsomely, or propose generous trade options, up to you. it'll be worth your while. please PM me, transaction will stay private. 

*i'd obviously also encourage anyone to PM me if you have a BL 460 you'd consider selling. 

thank you,
Michael Sarno

Still looking for my old BL 460. Are you out there?

Would also "settle" for any other BL 460 that someone is willing to part with.

PM me. Thanks!
If anyone finds a second one, let me know !!

Would sell my exwife for one for my son.............He's a Stahl collector.

Rawn

Hi Michael- I just checked my November 15, 2008 auction and you did not consign that one. Got a Drum, Uzit, Lenox, and Red Hindu among others, but that one must have already been sold. So even I don't know who has it.:(

posts.post_title: T206 Joss Piching Broad Leaf 460 SGC10
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Joss (Hands at Chest) Broad Leaf 460 SGC10 (no paper loss just creases and wear) that I may consider trading or selling given the right offer.  Please e-mail me for scans at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Best regards,
Mike Brailey

Thanks Mike! Email sent. Yes, I'm interested.

Barry- thanks for checking into this for me...I guess I sold it prior to your auction.

Best-
MS
